name.en: A Day in the Life of Serika
name.jp: A Day in the Life of Serika
name.thai: A Day in the Life of Serika
name.ko: A Day in the Life of Serika

desc.en: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.jp: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.thai: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.ko: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.zh_tw: 老師和對策委員會學生們跟蹤茜香，來到她打工的拉麵店。大家吃了拉麵度過愉快的時光，可是茜香依然一副沒好氣的樣子。茜香在打完工回家的路上被頭盔團綁架。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师和对策委员会学生们跟踪芹香，来到她打工的拉面店。大家吃了拉面度过愉快的时光，可是芹香依然一副没好气的样子。芹香在打完工回家的路上被头盔团绑架。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师和对策委员会学生们跟踪茜香，来到她打工的拉面店。大家吃了拉面度过愉快的时光，可是茜香依然一副没好气的样子。茜香在打完工回家的路上被头盔团绑架。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师和对策委员会学生们跟踪茜香，来到她打工的拉面店。大家吃了拉面度过愉快的时光，可是茜香依然一副没好气的样子。茜香在打完工回家的路上被头盔团绑架。

desc.en: Sensei bumped into Serika and greeted her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodged but was followed by Sensei closely; she later admitted that she was going to part-time jobs and asked Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei didn't listen.
desc.jp: Sensei bumped into Serika and greeted her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodged but was followed by Sensei closely; she later admitted that she was going to part-time jobs and asked Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei didn't listen.
desc.thai: Sensei bumped into Serika and greeted her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodged but was followed by Sensei closely; she later admitted that she was going to part-time jobs and asked Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei didn't listen.
desc.ko: Sensei bumped into Serika and greeted her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodged but was followed by Sensei closely; she later admitted that she was going to part-time jobs and asked Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei didn't listen.
desc.zh_tw: 老師撞見了茜香，向她親切地問好，並表示想知道她去哪裡、做什麼。茜香躲閃著，但老師步步緊跟；茜香後承認是打工，並要求老師不再跟隨，但老師並沒有聽從。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师撞见了芹香，向她亲切地问好，并表示想知道她去哪里、做什么。芹香躲闪着，但老师步步紧跟；芹香后承认是打工，并要求老师不再跟随，但老师并没有听从。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师撞见了茜香，向她亲切地问好，并表示想知道她去哪里、做什么。茜香躲闪着，但老师步步紧跟；茜香后承认是打工，并要求老师不再跟随，但老师并没有听从。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师撞见了茜香，向她亲切地问好，并表示想知道她去哪里、做什么。茜香躲闪着，但老师步步紧跟；茜香后承认是打工，并要求老师不再跟随，但老师并没有听从。

school.jp: アビドス高等学校

desc.en: The 11th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays at the "Recruitment" (Gacha) page.
desc.jp: The 11th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays at the "Recruitment" (Gacha) page.
desc.thai: The 11th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays at the "Recruitment" (Gacha) page.
desc.ko: The 11th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays at the "Recruitment" (Gacha) page.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十一首曲子，常在“招聘”（抽卡）页面播放。
desc.zh_tw: The 11th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays at the "Recruitment" (Gacha) page.

desc.en: Sensei brought others at the FTF to the very ramen store that Serika was working for. Though surprised, Serika led the way to the table; later, Nonomi purposed to pay with her cards, but Sensei did that with his own at last. After lunch, everyone returned to school under the strong request by the embarrassed Serika.
desc.jp: Sensei brought others at the FTF to the very ramen store that Serika was working for. Though surprised, Serika led the way to the table; later, Nonomi purposed to pay with her cards, but Sensei did that with his own at last. After lunch, everyone returned to school under the strong request by the embarrassed Serika.
desc.thai: Sensei brought others at the FTF to the very ramen store that Serika was working for. Though surprised, Serika led the way to the table; later, Nonomi purposed to pay with her cards, but Sensei did that with his own at last. After lunch, everyone returned to school under the strong request by the embarrassed Serika.
desc.ko: Sensei brought others at the FTF to the very ramen store that Serika was working for. Though surprised, Serika led the way to the table; later, Nonomi purposed to pay with her cards, but Sensei did that with his own at last. After lunch, everyone returned to school under the strong request by the embarrassed Serika.
desc.zh_tw: 老師帶著對策委員會的其它人來到了茜香打工的拉麵店，茜香大為震撼。然後，茜香帶領大家就坐；之後，野乃美主動提出結賬，但老師最終還是用大人的卡片結了賬。吃飽後，大家在茜香的難堪與強烈要求下返回了學校。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师带着对策委员会的其它人来到了芹香打工的拉面店，芹香大为震撼。然后，芹香带领大家就坐；之后，野宫主动提出结账，但老师最终还是用大人的卡片结了账。吃饱后，大家在芹香的难堪与强烈要求下返回了学校。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师带着对策委员会的其它人来到了茜香打工的拉面店，茜香大为震撼。然后，茜香带领大家就坐；之后，野乃美主动提出结账，但老师最终还是用大人的卡片结了账。吃饱后，大家在茜香的难堪与强烈要求下返回了学校。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师带着对策委员会的其它人来到了茜香打工的拉面店，茜香大为震撼。然后，茜香带领大家就坐；之后，野乃美主动提出结账，但老师最终还是用大人的卡片结了账。吃饱后，大家在茜香的难堪与强烈要求下返回了学校。

hobby.zh_tw: 慢跑、鍛鍊體力、騎自行車

desc.en: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.jp: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.thai: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.ko: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.zh_tw: 柴大將是一位在阿拜多斯校區附近經營著一個名叫“柴犬拉麵”的餐廳老闆，也是茜香打工的上司。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 柴大将是一位在阿拜多斯校区附近经营着一个名叫“柴犬拉面”的餐厅老板，也是茜香打工的上司。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 柴大将是一位在阿拜多斯校区附近经营着一个名叫“柴犬拉面”的餐厅老板，也是茜香打工的上司。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 柴大将是一位在阿拜多斯校区附近经营着一个名叫“柴犬拉面”的餐厅老板，也是茜香打工的上司。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.

desc.ko: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。
desc.zh_tw: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.

desc.en: Serika finally got off work at night, but was ambushed by the Helmet Gang. She was captured alive.
desc.jp: Serika finally got off work at night, but was ambushed by the Helmet Gang. She was captured alive.
desc.thai: Serika finally got off work at night, but was ambushed by the Helmet Gang. She was captured alive.
desc.ko: Serika finally got off work at night, but was ambushed by the Helmet Gang. She was captured alive.
desc.zh_tw: 茜香晚上終於下班，但卻遭到了頭盔團的前後夾擊，茜香被活捉。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 芹香晚上终于下班，但却遭到了头盔团的前后夹击，芹香被活捉。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 茜香晚上终于下班，但却遭到了头盔团的前后夹击，茜香被活捉。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 茜香晚上终于下班，但却遭到了头盔团的前后夹击，茜香被活捉。

desc.en: Sensei sees Problem Solver out of Abydos. In the mean time, Ayane and Serika pay Master Shiba a visit in the hospital. He tells the girls that the ramen shop's building has been taken over by the Kaiser Corporation.
desc.jp: Sensei sees Problem Solver out of Abydos. In the mean time, Ayane and Serika pay Master Shiba a visit in the hospital. He tells the girls that the ramen shop's building has been taken over by the Kaiser Corporation.
desc.thai: Sensei sees Problem Solver out of Abydos. In the mean time, Ayane and Serika pay Master Shiba a visit in the hospital. He tells the girls that the ramen shop's building has been taken over by the Kaiser Corporation.
desc.ko: Sensei sees Problem Solver out of Abydos. In the mean time, Ayane and Serika pay Master Shiba a visit in the hospital. He tells the girls that the ramen shop's building has been taken over by the Kaiser Corporation.
desc.zh_tw: 老師為前往阿拜多斯的便利屋送行。另一方面，綾音和茜香一同去找住院的柴關老闆，從老闆口中得知拉麵店的大樓已落入凱薩手中的事。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师为前往阿拜多斯的便利屋送行。另一方面，绫音和芹香一同去找住院的柴关老板，从老板口中得知拉面店的大楼已落入凯萨手中的事。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师为前往阿拜多斯的便利屋送行。另一方面，绫音和茜香一同去找住院的柴关老板，从老板口中得知拉面店的大楼已落入凯萨手中的事。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师为前往阿拜多斯的便利屋送行。另一方面，绫音和茜香一同去找住院的柴关老板，从老板口中得知拉面店的大楼已落入凯萨手中的事。

desc.en: Due to the inability to pay rent, as well as exposing their location during the fight with the Prefect Team, the Problem Solver had to move their office out of the place. Though saying "Because this is how a badass should be...", Aru was interrupted and was commented with "really worries others".
desc.jp: Due to the inability to pay rent, as well as exposing their location during the fight with the Prefect Team, the Problem Solver had to move their office out of the place. Though saying "Because this is how a badass should be...", Aru was interrupted and was commented with "really worries others".
desc.thai: Due to the inability to pay rent, as well as exposing their location during the fight with the Prefect Team, the Problem Solver had to move their office out of the place. Though saying "Because this is how a badass should be...", Aru was interrupted and was commented with "really worries others".
desc.ko: Due to the inability to pay rent, as well as exposing their location during the fight with the Prefect Team, the Problem Solver had to move their office out of the place. Though saying "Because this is how a badass should be...", Aru was interrupted and was commented with "really worries others".
desc.zh_tw: 由於交不起房租，加上上次與風紀委員會的戰鬥暴露了自己的位置，便利屋一行人不得不搬出自己原有的住宅。亞瑠表示“因為這才是壞蛋……”卻被多人打斷，表示亞瑠真是令人操心。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 由于交不起房租，加上上次与风纪委员会的战斗暴露了自己的位置，便利屋一行人不得不搬出自己原有的住宅。阿露表示“因为这才是坏蛋……”却被多人打断，表示阿露真是令人操心。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 由于交不起房租，加上上次与风纪委员会的战斗暴露了自己的位置，便利屋一行人不得不搬出自己原有的住宅。亚瑠表示“因为这才是坏蛋……”却被多人打断，表示亚瑠真是令人操心。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 由于交不起房租，加上上次与风纪委员会的战斗暴露了自己的位置，便利屋一行人不得不搬出自己原有的住宅。亚瑠表示“因为这才是坏蛋……”却被多人打断，表示亚瑠真是令人操心。

ゲヘナ学園
ゲヘナ学園
ゲヘナ学園

desc.en: Sensei met all the Problem Solver 68 on move and wished them a happy trip. Aru said it was a pleasant experience to be a cooperation partner and promised they would come back to Abydos for him, and especially for the ramen. The truck loaded with all the stuff disappeared at the cross then.
desc.jp: Sensei met all the Problem Solver 68 on move and wished them a happy trip. Aru said it was a pleasant experience to be a cooperation partner and promised they would come back to Abydos for him, and especially for the ramen. The truck loaded with all the stuff disappeared at the cross then.
desc.thai: Sensei met all the Problem Solver 68 on move and wished them a happy trip. Aru said it was a pleasant experience to be a cooperation partner and promised they would come back to Abydos for him, and especially for the ramen. The truck loaded with all the stuff disappeared at the cross then.
desc.ko: Sensei met all the Problem Solver 68 on move and wished them a happy trip. Aru said it was a pleasant experience to be a cooperation partner and promised they would come back to Abydos for him, and especially for the ramen. The truck loaded with all the stuff disappeared at the cross then.
desc.zh_tw: 老師遇到了搬家的便利屋全體成員們，祝他們一路順風。亞瑠表示與老師成為合作伙伴很高興，且今後一定也會回阿拜多斯看看，尤其是會回來吃美味的拉麵。裝著便利屋68東西的卡車隨後消失在路口。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师遇到了搬家的便利屋全体成员们，祝他们一路顺风。阿露表示与老师成为合作伙伴很高兴，且今后一定也会回阿拜多斯看看，尤其是会回来吃美味的拉面。装着便利屋68东西的卡车随后消失在路口。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师遇到了搬家的便利屋全体成员们，祝他们一路顺风。亚瑠表示与老师成为合作伙伴很高兴，且今后一定也会回阿拜多斯看看，尤其是会回来吃美味的拉面。装着便利屋68东西的卡车随后消失在路口。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师遇到了搬家的便利屋全体成员们，祝他们一路顺风。亚瑠表示与老师成为合作伙伴很高兴，且今后一定也会回阿拜多斯看看，尤其是会回来吃美味的拉面。装着便利屋68东西的卡车随后消失在路口。

desc.en: Ayane and Serika visited Master Shiba and expressed their pity on the destruction of the ramen shop. But unexpectedly, Master Shiba said that he had already received a notice to close down the store, which made the two very surprised. Master Shiba explained that due to the inability to pay the debts, the lands of Abydos were not belong to the school and was bought by Kaiser. Master Shiba also mentioned that there was a big bag of money in front of the store, and Sensei suggested that they might be used as a reconstruction fund.
desc.jp: Ayane and Serika visited Master Shiba and expressed their pity on the destruction of the ramen shop. But unexpectedly, Master Shiba said that he had already received a notice to close down the store, which made the two very surprised. Master Shiba explained that due to the inability to pay the debts, the lands of Abydos were not belong to the school and was bought by Kaiser. Master Shiba also mentioned that there was a big bag of money in front of the store, and Sensei suggested that they might be used as a reconstruction fund.
desc.thai: Ayane and Serika visited Master Shiba and expressed their pity on the destruction of the ramen shop. But unexpectedly, Master Shiba said that he had already received a notice to close down the store, which made the two very surprised. Master Shiba explained that due to the inability to pay the debts, the lands of Abydos were not belong to the school and was bought by Kaiser. Master Shiba also mentioned that there was a big bag of money in front of the store, and Sensei suggested that they might be used as a reconstruction fund.
desc.ko: Ayane and Serika visited Master Shiba and expressed their pity on the destruction of the ramen shop. But unexpectedly, Master Shiba said that he had already received a notice to close down the store, which made the two very surprised. Master Shiba explained that due to the inability to pay the debts, the lands of Abydos were not belong to the school and was bought by Kaiser. Master Shiba also mentioned that there was a big bag of money in front of the store, and Sensei suggested that they might be used as a reconstruction fund.
desc.zh_tw: 綾音和茜香前來看望柴大將，表示拉麵店被毀掉了實屬可惜。但意外的是，柴大將表示本來就收到了關店通知，這讓兩人感到非常詫異。大將表示，前些年由於債款無法還上，阿拜多斯土地所有權實際已經不屬於學校，貸款給了凱撒公司。大將還提到了店門口有一個大袋子裝著錢，老師則提議不妨將它們作為重建資金。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 绫音和芹香前来看望柴大将，表示拉面店被毁掉了实属可惜。但意外的是，柴大将表示本来就收到了关店通知，这让两人感到非常诧异。大将表示，前些年由于债款无法还上，阿拜多斯土地所有权实际已经不属于学校，贷款给了凯撒公司。大将还提到了店门口有一个大袋子装着钱，老师则提议不妨将它们作为重建资金。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 绫音和茜香前来看望柴大将，表示拉面店被毁掉了实属可惜。但意外的是，柴大将表示本来就收到了关店通知，这让两人感到非常诧异。大将表示，前些年由于债款无法还上，阿拜多斯土地所有权实际已经不属于学校，贷款给了凯撒公司。大将还提到了店门口有一个大袋子装着钱，老师则提议不妨将它们作为重建资金。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 绫音和茜香前来看望柴大将，表示拉面店被毁掉了实属可惜。但意外的是，柴大将表示本来就收到了关店通知，这让两人感到非常诧异。大将表示，前些年由于债款无法还上，阿拜多斯土地所有权实际已经不属于学校，贷款给了凯撒公司。大将还提到了店门口有一个大袋子装着钱，老师则提议不妨将它们作为重建资金。

school.jp: アビドス高等学校

hobby.jp: 家計簿をつけること、骨董品収集

desc.en: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.jp: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.thai: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.ko: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.zh_tw: 柴大將是一位在阿拜多斯校區附近經營著一個名叫“柴犬拉麵”的餐廳老闆，也是茜香打工的上司。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 柴大将是一位在阿拜多斯校区附近经营着一个名叫“柴犬拉面”的餐厅老板，也是茜香打工的上司。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 柴大将是一位在阿拜多斯校区附近经营着一个名叫“柴犬拉面”的餐厅老板，也是茜香打工的上司。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 柴大将是一位在阿拜多斯校区附近经营着一个名叫“柴犬拉面”的餐厅老板，也是茜香打工的上司。

desc.en: One day, Veritas reaches out to Sensei about the discovery of a suspicious machine. On the way to their club room, Sensei joins up with the Game Development Department to investigate the machine, but none of them are able to get to the bottom of its true nature... As if suddenly drawn by an inexplicable force, Aris touches the machine and activates it.
desc.jp: One day, Veritas reaches out to Sensei about the discovery of a suspicious machine. On the way to their club room, Sensei joins up with the Game Development Department to investigate the machine, but none of them are able to get to the bottom of its true nature... As if suddenly drawn by an inexplicable force, Aris touches the machine and activates it.
desc.thai: One day, Veritas reaches out to Sensei about the discovery of a suspicious machine. On the way to their club room, Sensei joins up with the Game Development Department to investigate the machine, but none of them are able to get to the bottom of its true nature... As if suddenly drawn by an inexplicable force, Aris touches the machine and activates it.
desc.ko: One day, Veritas reaches out to Sensei about the discovery of a suspicious machine. On the way to their club room, Sensei joins up with the Game Development Department to investigate the machine, but none of them are able to get to the bottom of its true nature... As if suddenly drawn by an inexplicable force, Aris touches the machine and activates it.
desc.zh_tw: 有一天，老師從貝里塔斯接獲發現可疑機器的訊息。前往貝里塔斯部室的途中，老師和遊戲開發部相遇，便一起調查機器的來歷。但大家都無法對機器的來歷做出結論…突然間，愛麗絲就像是被吸引般伸出手觸碰機器，機器啟動的同時，愛麗絲也發生了異變。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 有一天，老师从贝里塔斯接获发现可疑机器的消息。前往贝里塔斯部室的途中，老师和游戏开发部相遇，便一起调查机器的来历。但大家都无法对机器的来历做出结论…突然间，爱丽丝就像是被吸引般伸出手触碰机器，机器启动的同时，爱丽丝也发生了异变。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 有一天，老师从贝里塔斯接获发现可疑机器的消息。前往贝里塔斯部室的途中，老师和游戏开发部相遇，便一起调查机器的来历。但大家都无法对机器的来历做出结论…突然间，爱丽丝就像是被吸引般伸出手触碰机器，机器启动的同时，爱丽丝也发生了异变。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 有一天，老师从贝里塔斯接获发现可疑机器的消息。前往贝里塔斯部室的途中，老师和游戏开发部相遇，便一起调查机器的来历。但大家都无法对机器的来历做出结论…突然间，爱丽丝就像是被吸引般伸出手触碰机器，机器启动的同时，爱丽丝也发生了异变。

desc.en: Aris met other Millennium students at school's square and she was welcomed and greeted with great delight. They were even given some "side quests" and received some snacks as the "mission" reward.
desc.jp: Aris met other Millennium students at school's square and she was welcomed and greeted with great delight. They were even given some "side quests" and received some snacks as the "mission" reward.
desc.thai: Aris met other Millennium students at school's square and she was welcomed and greeted with great delight. They were even given some "side quests" and received some snacks as the "mission" reward.
desc.ko: Aris met other Millennium students at school's square and she was welcomed and greeted with great delight. They were even given some "side quests" and received some snacks as the "mission" reward.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲在千年廣場遇到了其他千年的學生，大家都很高興見到她。中途愛麗絲還收到了幾個支線任務，被以報酬的名義贈送了點心。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝在千年广场遇到了其他千年的学生，大家都很高兴见到她。中途爱丽丝还收到了几个支线任务，被以报酬的名义赠送了点心。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝在千年广场遇到了其他千年的学生，大家都很高兴见到她。中途爱丽丝还收到了几个支线任务，被以报酬的名义赠送了点心。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝在千年广场遇到了其他千年的学生，大家都很高兴见到她。中途爱丽丝还收到了几个支线任务，被以报酬的名义赠送了点心。

desc.en: Aris met the three at Engineering Department. Utaha asked the conditions of the Sword of Light, Aris said that it was kept with her utmost care.
desc.jp: Aris met the three at Engineering Department. Utaha asked the conditions of the Sword of Light, Aris said that it was kept with her utmost care.
desc.thai: Aris met the three at Engineering Department. Utaha asked the conditions of the Sword of Light, Aris said that it was kept with her utmost care.
desc.ko: Aris met the three at Engineering Department. Utaha asked the conditions of the Sword of Light, Aris said that it was kept with her utmost care.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲在校園裡見到了工程部三人，後者表示是出來蒐羅新裝備的。詠葉問愛麗絲光之劍近況如何，愛麗絲則表示在很愛護地使用著。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝在校园里见到了工程部三人，后者表示是出来搜罗新装备的。歌原问爱丽丝光之剑近况如何，爱丽丝则表示在很爱护地使用着。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝在校园里见到了工程部三人，后者表示是出来搜罗新装备的。咏叶问爱丽丝光之剑近况如何，爱丽丝则表示在很爱护地使用着。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝在校园里见到了工程部三人，后者表示是出来搜罗新装备的。咏叶问爱丽丝光之剑近况如何，爱丽丝则表示在很爱护地使用着。

desc.en: Being called "little" angered Neru, but still she dragged Aris and Sensei to an arcade store. As expected, Aris defeated Neru. Though Aris had already been teaching her for quite a while, Neru was still pretty frustrated when hearing that Aris said she was playng bad. Despite all of this, she asked Aris to teach her combos.
desc.jp: Being called "little" angered Neru, but still she dragged Aris and Sensei to an arcade store. As expected, Aris defeated Neru. Though Aris had already been teaching her for quite a while, Neru was still pretty frustrated when hearing that Aris said she was playng bad. Despite all of this, she asked Aris to teach her combos.
desc.thai: Being called "little" angered Neru, but still she dragged Aris and Sensei to an arcade store. As expected, Aris defeated Neru. Though Aris had already been teaching her for quite a while, Neru was still pretty frustrated when hearing that Aris said she was playng bad. Despite all of this, she asked Aris to teach her combos.
desc.ko: Being called "little" angered Neru, but still she dragged Aris and Sensei to an arcade store. As expected, Aris defeated Neru. Though Aris had already been teaching her for quite a while, Neru was still pretty frustrated when hearing that Aris said she was playng bad. Despite all of this, she asked Aris to teach her combos.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲叫寧瑠“小不點”讓後者頗為不滿，但還是拽著老師和愛麗絲到了遊戲廳。不出所料，寧瑠不斷輸給了愛麗絲，儘管愛麗絲已經教了她相當一段時間。寧瑠雖然非常惱火愛麗絲評價她的水平不好，但還是請教愛麗絲連招的操作。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝叫尼禄“小不点”让后者颇为不满，但还是拽着老师和爱丽丝到了游戏厅。不出所料，尼禄不断输给了爱丽丝，尽管爱丽丝已经教了她相当一段时间。尼禄虽然非常恼火爱丽丝评价她的水平不好，但还是请教爱丽丝连招的操作。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝叫宁瑠“小不点”让后者颇为不满，但还是拽着老师和爱丽丝到了游戏厅。不出所料，宁瑠不断输给了爱丽丝，尽管爱丽丝已经教了她相当一段时间。宁瑠虽然非常恼火爱丽丝评价她的水平不好，但还是请教爱丽丝连招的操作。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝叫宁瑠“小不点”让后者颇为不满，但还是拽着老师和爱丽丝到了游戏厅。不出所料，宁瑠不断输给了爱丽丝，尽管爱丽丝已经教了她相当一段时间。宁瑠虽然非常恼火爱丽丝评价她的水平不好，但还是请教爱丽丝连招的操作。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.thai: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.ko: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_tw: Key是愛麗絲資料庫中的另一個人格，其最先是用來指引“王女”（即愛麗絲）摧毀基沃託斯的存在。在主線第二篇中，Key在與Divi:Sion軍隊的殘骸觸碰後被啟用；在最終章中，愛麗絲向Key請求幫助，但過程中卻被摧毀，Key一命換一命，將愛麗絲復活。已知的最後一份複製儲存在桃井承載著G.BIBLE的遊戲機上，但在經歷這麼多事件後，G.BIBLE出於未知狀態。
desc.zh_cn_jp: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。
desc.zh_cn_tw: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。
desc.zh_cn_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。
